Package emissary.client

Class EmissaryClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • emissary.client.EmissaryClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectoryAdapter, HeartbeatAdapter, WorkSpaceAdapter
    public class EmissaryClient
extends Object
    Base class of all the actions that use HttpClient.

        public EmissaryResponse send​(org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpUriRequestBase method,
                             @Nullable
                             org.apache.hc.client5.http.cookie.Cookie cookie)
        Sends a request to the web server. The request can be any HttpMethod. Adds the specified cookie to the Http State
        Parameters:
        method - the method to be sent
        cookie - a cookie to set on the request
